divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were heading home one night and we saw a big, giant thing in the sky. It looked like a big orange disc. We saw it for just a split second, before it disappeared. It looked like one giant fireball to as it disappeared.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around November 17th 2004
